info.name: Developer Tools - Crystal Clear toolbar button
info.description:
Crystal Clear toolbar button for users using dark themes with the Developer Tools - toolbar button add-on installed.
Link > https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/web-developer-tools-/
info.additionalInfo:
"Access and activate the native Firefox Web Developer tools (Inspector, Debugger, Style Editor, etc) faster through this toolbar button (menu). Button can be placed on any toolbar."

https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/web-developer-tools-


Icon created by Everaldo (slight modification).
http://www.everaldo.com/crystal/
